commandDescription: Creates a new record for a given custom metadata type in the current project
typenameFlagDescription: DeveloperName of the type to create a record for
protectedFlagDescription: Visibility for the record. If blank, uses false
inputDirectoryFlagDescription: Specify the directory where the custom metadata type definition will be pulled from (default is 'force-app/main/default/objects')
outputDirectoryFlagDescription: Specify the directory where the file will be created (default is 'force-app/main/default/customMetadata')
successResponse: Created custom metadata record of the type '%s' with record developer name '%s', label '%s', and protected '%s' at '%s'.
notValidAPINameError: '%s' is not a valid api name for a custom metadata object.
notAValidRecordNameError: %s is not a valid record name for a custom metadata record.
notAValidLabelNameError: %s is too long to be a label name.
